attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day we hear something on the radio or see something on the news or in the papers regarding violent crime or knife attacks. IS the government going to "get tough on knife crime" ever? WHAT is the deterrent for these criminals? 
Bring back the birch. Flog them, AND jail them. Would they repeat offend? I doubt it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
